credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: Washerwomen, Viterbo: Chapel and Bastion
medium: Black, colored chalks, on blue paper
description: Vertically rectangular composition. Women wash clothes in the foreground beside remains of old building (partially shown). In the background at left, a structure with dome and adjoining building appear. Inscribed in ink, lower left: "Viterbo / P.M. August 25th 91.."
name: Drawing
